TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class PredictionEngine<TSrc,TDst> : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Api.PredictionEngineBase<TSrc,TDst> where TSrc : class where TDst : class, new()
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PredictionEngine`2<class TSrc, class .ctor TDst> extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Api.PredictionEngineBase`2<!TSrc, !TDst>
Public NotInheritable Class PredictionEngine(Of TSrc, TDst) Inherits PredictionEngineBase(Of TSrc, TDst)

type PredictionEngine<'Src, 'Dst (requires 'Src : null and 'Dst : null and 'Dst : (new : unit -> 'Dst))> = class inherit PredictionEngineBase<'Src, 'Dst (requires 'Src : null and 'Dst : null and 'Dst : (new : unit -> 'Dst))>

Docs.typeparam: The user-defined type that holds the example.
The user-defined type that holds the prediction.
Docs.summary: A class that runs the previously trained model (and the preceding transform pipeline) on the in-memory data, one example at a time. This can also be used with trained pipelines that do not end with a predictor: in this case, the 'prediction' will be just the outcome of all the transformations.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Predict (TSrc example, ref TDst prediction);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Predict(!TSrc example, !TDst& prediction) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Predict (example As TSrc, ByRef prediction As TDst)

Docs.param: The object to store the prediction in. If it's null, a new one will be created, otherwise the old one is reused.
Docs.summary: Run prediction pipeline on one example.
